DynamicProperty.name: CtrlMechanism
DynamicProperty.description: The Controller Mechanism to get data.

DynamicProperty.name: CtrlSpecAxis
DynamicProperty.description: Specify which only one axis to take value. 0 will take all.

DynamicProperty.name: MechSpecAxis
DynamicProperty.description: Specify which only one axis to update. 0 will update all.

DynamicProperty.name: NumberOfAxesStatus
DynamicProperty.description: Status of Number of Axes updated.

IOSignal.name: Update
IOSignal.description: Set to high (1) to update the Mechanism with Controller axes values.
